entity.name: concept
entity.query: SELECT c.id as internal_id, c.serialisedId as id, c.ontology_id, c.fullySpecifiedName, c.effectiveTime, c.active, c.status_id, c.module_id, status_concept.serialisedId as status_concept_id, module_concept.serialisedId as module_concept_id, o.id as version_id, o.name as version_title FROM Concept status_concept, Concept module_concept, Concept c, Ontology o WHERE c.status_id=status_concept.id AND c.module_id=module_concept.id AND c.ontology_id=o.id

entity.name: description
entity.query: select term, serialisedId from Description where about_id='${concept.internal_id}'
